xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 16 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 03:11 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 03:12 <kushalkhandelwal> is now known as <Guest96184> 08:21 <BogdanVancea1_> has quit 10:34 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 11:11 <Guest96184> is now known as <kushalkhandelwal> 11:11 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey sdumitriu1 11:12 <sdumitriu1> Hey 11:12 <kushalkhandelwal> I worked on the issue and started learning more about Prototype Js and how I can use it in my task 11:12 <kushalkhandelwal> I have worked on the function for converting 11:13 <kushalkhandelwal> extracting input fields within the table with id extradata-list-PhenoTips.MeasurementsClass 11:13 <kushalkhandelwal> hiding them using 11:13 <kushalkhandelwal> hide() 11:13 <kushalkhandelwal> I have to compile all that 11:14 <kushalkhandelwal> Now I have to replace them with new pair of inputs 11:14 <kushalkhandelwal> pass the values to the old inputs 11:14 <kushalkhandelwal> Is this the right way of going about it ? 11:15 <kushalkhandelwal> I wont be available from today as I would be traveling for my sisters wedding , would be back by 20-21 May 11:15 <kushalkhandelwal> from 21st May I would be able to devote full time on the project 11:19 <sdumitriu1> Hold on a bit 11:19 <ravigarg27> has quit 11:19 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok :) 11:19 <ravigarg27_> has joined #phenotips 11:29 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, Busy ? 11:29 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1, Busy ? 11:30 <sdumitriu1> A bit 11:30 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh ok :) 11:30 <kushalkhandelwal> No issues 11:30 <sdumitriu1> Read 11:30 <sdumitriu1> So, yes, that is the right approach 11:30 <kushalkhandelwal> Reply when u get free 11:31 <sdumitriu1> Hint: new Element('input') 11:31 <sdumitriu1> Look at the prototype documentation for Element 11:31 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh ok :) 11:31 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes reading that 11:31 <kushalkhandelwal> read about element 11:31 <kushalkhandelwal> would read more on it 11:31 <kushalkhandelwal> Time :( 11:31 <kushalkhandelwal> I would try to complete asap 11:33 <kushalkhandelwal> I initially thought of using Jquery 11:33 <kushalkhandelwal> bt thats not included in package ? 11:33 <kushalkhandelwal> Right ? 11:33 <kushalkhandelwal> Was testing everything in console 11:34 <sdumitriu1> No, not yet, I don't really like jQuery 11:35 <kushalkhandelwal> hm 11:35 <kushalkhandelwal> Then started on Prototype 11:35 <kushalkhandelwal> as it would be useful 11:35 <kushalkhandelwal> you already use that 12:10 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 12:20 <ravigarg27_> has quit 12:47 <gustavojordan> has joined #phenotips 13:18 <jordan_> has joined #phenotips 13:18 <gustavojordan> has quit 13:19 <jordan_> has quit 13:19 <gustavojordan> has joined #phenotips 14:49 <gustavojordan> Hi, sdumitriu, how is the progress of the proposals? 15:39 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 15:42 <sdumitriu> has quit 15:44 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 16:07 <ravigarg27> has quit 16:10 <gustavojordan> has quit 16:19 <gustavojordan> has joined #phenotips 16:30 <ravigarg27_> has quit 16:31 <sdumitriu2> has joined #phenotips 16:34 <sdumitriu1> has quit 16:50 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 16:52 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 18:10 <gustavojordan> has quit 18:25 <sdumitriu1> has quit 20:25 <marta> has quit 20:44 <marta> has joined #phenotips 23:48 <ravigarg27> has quit
